entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
